description:
This is the last of a 6-part series of foundation math concepts for kids who are attending elementary or primary school. Each video captures the essence of each concept in only less than 15 minutes, which makes it very simple and useful for anyone to understand the basics of math!

There are 8 topics with 2â€“8 videos in each topic. Each video is designed to last less than 15 mins, with clear explanation on problem-solving ways, and simple graphics to make the lesson more engaging. All these lessons are based on the mathematics curriculum of the Singapore Educational System and are intended for Primary 6 PSLE students.
title: Fun, Simple and Useful Math for Kids! (Part 6/6)
